    • Uses of Metric in org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics

      Subinterfaces of Metric in org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TestUserMetric
      Interface for prediction and recommendation accuracy evaluators.
      Classes in org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics that implement Metric 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMetric<E>
      A simple metric base class that tracks the current evaluation.
      class  AbstractTestUserMetric
      Abstract base implementation of TestUserMetric.

    • Uses of Metric in org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics.predict

      Classes in org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics.predict that implement Metric 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CoveragePredictMetric
      Simple evaluator that records user, rating and prediction counts and computes recommender coverage over the queried items.
      class  EntropyPredictMetric
      Evaluate a recommender's prediction accuracy by computing the mutual information between the ratings and the prediction.
      class  HLUtilityPredictMetric 
      class  MAEPredictMetric
      Evaluate a recommender's predictions by Mean Absolute Error.
      class  NDCGPredictMetric
      Evaluate a recommender's predictions with normalized discounted cumulative gain.
      class  RMSEPredictMetric
      Evaluate a recommender's prediction accuracy with RMSE.

    • Uses of Metric in org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics.topn

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NDCGTopNMetric 
      class  TopNLengthMetric
      Metric that measures how long a TopN list actually is.

    • Uses of Metric in org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ModelMetric
      A metric that evaluates an algorithm model.
      Classes in org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest that implement Metric 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FunctionModelMetric
      Model metric backed by an arbitrary function.
      class  FunctionMultiModelMetric
      Model metric backed by an arbitrary function that returns multiple rows per algorithm.
